name: MyxoFill
title: Decentralized IT Field Technician Platform
tagline: Eliminate middlemen. Empower technicians. Connect directly.

background.headline: Fragmented IT Field Service Ecosystem
background.summary: The IT on-site support market is dominated by subcontracting layers that absorb 70–85% of client budgets while technicians earn a fraction. Communication bottlenecks, data leakage, and late payments plague efficiency.
background.insight: MyxoFill reinvents this model by cutting out intermediaries and giving both sides what they need — direct access, verified credentials, and fair compensation.

structuralChallenges: Technicians have no access to real contract value or client info.
Communication delays cascade through multi-layer handoffs.
Data passes through too many subcontractors, raising breach risk.
80% of freelancers face payment delays; agencies hold invoices hostage.
No merit-based skill scoring; unqualified labor undermines trust.
Agencies exploit dependency — contractors earn less with each renewal.

marketOpportunity.insight: Businesses seek cost reduction and accountability. Technicians seek reliable payment and independence. MyxoFill builds a verified network linking both.
dataPoints: 47% of the global workforce will be freelance by 2025 (Worksme.com).
8 in 10 freelancers report late or partial pay (grey.co).
78% of CFOs are targeting cost efficiency under inflation (EPAM survey).

solution.headline: Our Transparent Platform Solution
solution.description: MyxoFill introduces a field-service marketplace where verified freelancers meet clients directly through transparent contracts, secure communication, and automated payments.

coreFeatures.title: Mobile-Optimized Dashboard
coreFeatures.text: Technicians and clients manage jobs via mobile or desktop UI — no complex dispatch system required.

coreFeatures.title: Location- & Skill-Based Job Posting
coreFeatures.text: Jobs broadcast automatically to nearby verified techs. The system splits large tasks into smaller, trackable assignments.

coreFeatures.title: Transparent Bidding
coreFeatures.text: All bids are visible; clients choose based on skill, not intermediaries. The system flags unfairly low offers to prevent race-to-bottom pricing.

coreFeatures.title: Skill Validation & Ratings
coreFeatures.text: Gamified skill quizzes, verified experience, and customer feedback form a visible merit profile.

coreFeatures.title: Escrow Payments & Invoicing
coreFeatures.text: Funds are automatically released upon task completion verification — ending months-long invoice chains.

coreFeatures.title: Secure Communication Channels
coreFeatures.text: All messages, photos, and project files are encrypted and stored within MyxoFlow's EU-based infrastructure.

coreFeatures.title: Continuous Skills Growth
coreFeatures.text: Technicians earn recommendations for upskilling and gain higher match visibility through consistent success.
